name: World of Warships: Legends – Aurora Borealis
name_original: World of Warships: Legends – Aurora Borealis
description:
It's a riddle, wrapped in a mystery, inside an enigma; the Northern reaches of the world are home to naval legends such as Aurora—which is eerily present for major events…

Includes: - Tier II cruiser Aurora - 3 days of Premium Account - 25x Type I camouflages - 25x rare boosters of every type (125 in total) - 37,000 Commander XP

If you already have Aurora, you'll receive compensation in the form of 1,500,000 credits. Content such as boosters, Commander XP, camouflages, etc., are only visible upon reaching a specific account level in the game.
